restaurant.cuisines: European, Asian, North Indian, Italian, Continental, Pizza

location.address: 2nd Floor, M-55, M Block Market, Greater Kailash (GK) 1, New Delhi

restaurant.name: Gastronomica Kitchen & Bar

event.title: Drunch Session with Smruti Jalpur
event.description: Smruti Jalpur is an artist musician from Mumbai. She and her band have done solo shows around the city and also played with numerous other musicians in and around a ton of spots in Mumbai and Delhi. They perform almost everything from Bollywood to Sufi to exemplary rock/shake and move. Her excursion in the realm of music has started and is driving her to her destination easily..

event.title: Mohd. Amir Live and Awesome
event.description: A soulful performer who can set the vibe with his mesmerizing voice and rocking numbers! Mohd Amir, based out of the capital city of India, New Delhi, is an amazing singer. He has done various solo acts across the city. Amir likes to perform unplugged versions of hot Bollywood numbers which are twisted and fused with his open personal style of playing. He commits that he can impress anyone by his voice and beautiful guitar performance.
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.title: Sivana Live and Awesome
event.description:
Sivana is a LIVE band based out of the capital city of India, New Delhi. It is an experimental trio/band.
It is a combination of seasoned musicians from different musical backgrounds who have come together with a unique approach to music; the band plays genres like Bollywood, retro, jazz, rock, pop, and progressive music with a percussive acoustic approach.
Sivana’s calm and happy LIVE approach is exactly what its music intends to make you feel. 

Band Members:
Jahnvi Rawat – Vocals
Shymak Lamba – Acoustic Percussive Fingerstyle Guitar
Dhruv Yadav – Lead Guitar, Sound illusion 
Robin Kujur – Bass
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.title: Kabeer Live and Awesome
event.description:
Kabeer has been singing professionally for more than a decade as an independent artist and as a band as well.
He has participated in the 17 college battle of bands all over India with his band.
He is also the winner of Channel [V] Launchpad 2011.
